Text.Page:
Hey, ...got a knack for business?

Well, don't worryâ€”I've got enough "knack" for both of us. I can already tell this is going to be a lucrative partnership, am I right?

Hemming, over in Faevine Vale, wants some cloud mushrooms. I'm a mycologist, so that's usually my thing. But the redcaps have taken over the valley, and I can't get near the place!"Redcaps, shmedcaps."

That's the spirit! Just grab the mushrooms and take them to Hemming with my regards

Keep his payment. I've cultivated Hemming as a long-term customer, so you're entitled to a little "hazard pay."

Redcaps in the valley? The faerie problem is worse than I thought!

That Hailas sure knows her mushrooms, though. These are great!

Here's the usual amount. Thanks to you...and Hailas!
The <font color='#660000'>cloud mushrooms</font> from Faevine Vale are a delicacy. I can't live without them!
